results.name: Smallest balanced prime of order n.
comment: Prime(k) is a balanced prime of order n if it is the average of the 2n+1 primes from prime(k-n) to prime(k+n).
link: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (first 1375 terms from Robert G. Wilson v)
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{p = Prime@ Range[2n +1]}, While[ Total[p] != (2n +1) p[[n +1]], p = Join[Rest@ p, {NextPrime[ p[[-1]]] }]]; p[[n +1]]]; Array[f, 46, 0] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 21 2004 and modified Apr 11 2017 *)
